nodes.text: "Plug-Eye" Maygo was a muscular Sanyassan who left his homeworld when he was a youth. He found his way to the spaceport district of the planet Annaj, where he took work as a bodyguard and a prizefighter. He earned the nickname of "Plug-Eye" after an iron ball from a malfunctioning slugthrower became lodged in his left eye socket. When he arrived in the Moddell sector Maygo was hired by the Kintan Gunrunners. His associates were the Nikto Tu'rsc'yulir and his Kintan strider called Kar'sylic.
